    # 开关 Switch

    # 基础用法

    ON ON

    FAIL FAIL 



    <template>
  <div style="padding: 64px">
    <div style="margin-top: 16px">
      <i-switch :value="true" type="error"></i-switch>
      <i-switch :value="true" :disabled="true" type="error"></i-switch>
      <i-switch :value="true" type="success"></i-switch>
      <i-switch :value="true" :disabled="true" type="success"></i-switch>
      <i-switch :value="false" :disabled="true" type="success"></i-switch>
      <i-switch :value="true" size="small" true-color="#FF6666"></i-switch>
      <i-switch :value="true" size="small" true-color="#00CC9E"> </i-switch>
    </div>
    <div style="margin-top: 16px">
      <iSwitch :value="true" true-color="#00CC9E">
        <span slot="open" style="margin-left:3px;">ON</span>
        <span slot="close">OFF</span>
      </iSwitch>
      <iSwitch :value="true" :disabled="true" type="success">
        <span slot="open" style="margin-left:3px;">ON</span>
        <span slot="close">OFF</span>
      </iSwitch>
      <br /><br />
      <iSwitch :value="true" type="error">
        <span slot="open">FAIL</span>
        <span slot="close">OFF</span>
      </iSwitch>
      <iSwitch :value="true"  :disabled="true" type="error">
        <span slot="open">FAIL</span>
        <span slot="close">OFF</span>
      </iSwitch>
      <br /><br />
      <br /><br />
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

    ← 步骤条 Steps 侧边栏 Side Menu →
